title: teamsherry
author: teamsherry
content: Hi guys am new here I want to know about Bitcoin and other stuffs happening here pls give me some resource Thank you guys

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Quote from: teamsherry on December 09, 2023, 06:50:32 PMHi guys am new here I want to know about Bitcoin and other stuffs happening here pls give me some resource Thank you guys Welcome mate and congratulations for finding the forum it's really a good thing and it would help your understand crypto-currency and Bitcoin in particular but you must be ready to do some learning and also learn to do your own research.But before anything check out the rules/regulations and frequently asked questions on the forum.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2766177.0And there are some good links on the forum about Bitcoin you definitely need to check out https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1588906.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1629118.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1631151.0

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: You are welcome. You will see this helpful: Useful information for Nigerian newbies

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Op you are very much welcome, thank God say you come find our local board sharpaly, because e dey give me joy as I dey see newbies Dem wey just dey register for the forum wey come their local board. Anyway most of the links wey I see my ogah Dem give you, na links concerning this forum, and for this forum if you wan survive you gat to obey the forum rules Wella, and if you wan grow for this forum you gats do enough reading. Because even the holy bible talk am say, study to show thy self approved, so you gats study hard. Any link wey dem give you for here, try make you cover am, na for you own benefit. I get one link to give you, that link na Mastering Bitcoin, and this one go help you understand about Bitcoin well well, if you read am go far or finish am.  Mastering Bitcoin

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: O patient is the best answer to most of your questions. And I will like you to read all the links they have provided for you to read and I will also recommend our local board rules for you to read so that you abide to the local rules too. And here is the local board rules link https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5430885.msg61477821#msg61477821 and lastly you have to read other people posts more than creating your personal threads and making comments. It is when you read other peoples threads and understand what they are saying then you can make comments from what you have understood from the reading. Forum is a simple place for you to enjoy.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange on December 09, 2023, 07:54:20 PMDo you like to read? So I will suggest you read Jameson Lopp Bitcoin ResourcesIf you also love to watch videos, then you can learn from Bitcoin for Beginners by Andreas Antonopoulos

comments.author: teamsherry
comments.body: Thanks for all the reply fam I really appreciate so much love in here

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: You're highly welcome to bitcointalk.org Naija local board , I believe many people have given you some major links you need to go through to know more about BTC and crypto which, are things we discuss here and to promote decentralized currency. You can grow your account fast if you can start reading some books and news that related to cryptocurrency and do everything possible to remain loyal to the rules and regulations that governed both Bitcointalk.org and Naija local board.Don't be carry away by fake promise of the scammers because, they are everywhere in the society but they are easy to identify if truly you want to avoid them for the rest of your life and, do everything possible to avoid short cut by not allow anyone to deceive you that they can move or upgrade you to full member within one week.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Quote from: teamsherry on December 09, 2023, 06:50:32 PMHi guys am new here I want to know about Bitcoin and other stuffs happening here pls give me some resource Thank you guys You can get everything you need to know about Bitcoin if you dedicate your time to learn about bitcoin and with time you you will have understanding about bitcoin. You can learn everything about Bitcoin but consistent learning will really help you to understand bitcoin,  do not try to make attempts to rush into the market to make profit when you don't have knowledge.  Learn first before investing and you won't have regret about bitcoin.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: teamsherry on December 10, 2023, 04:07:39 AMThanks for all the reply fam I really appreciate so much love in hereAnd another thing I will also advise you is that you have to expand your writing. Your writings are too short and when you write it some lengthy like 5 to 7 line and the content is presentable then some people will reward with merits. So work on your writing skill so you can do well in the forum. And with that posting you will be in the group not quality posters and for now with your one line posting you are a shit poster. I don tell you so make you adjust your posting lines to more lines.

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on December 10, 2023, 04:35:21 PMQuote from: teamsherry on December 10, 2023, 04:07:39 AMThanks for all the reply fam I really appreciate so much love in hereAnd another thing I will also advise you is that you have to expand your writing. Your writings are too short and when you write it some lengthy like 5 to 7 line and the content is presentable then some people will reward with merits. So work on your writing skill so you can do well in the forum. And with that posting you will be in the group not quality posters and for now with your one line posting you are a shit poster. I don tell you so make you adjust your posting lines to more lines.Nah true talk be this boss because me go fit relate nah after e don too late I con realize am as your account still fresh work on the quality of your post this place  nor be Facebook or other social media you go just drop short line post love and like go just full the post. This one nah sharp forum about bitcoin its self and other related stuff so make sure your post is impacting and meaningful nor post any how stuff might reduce chances of getting good response and merits.

comments.author: Jessie2121
comments.body: Quote from: teamsherry on December 09, 2023, 06:50:32 PMHi guys am new here I want to know about Bitcoin and other stuffs happening here pls give me some resource Thank you guys My broda welcome to this our locality wey them call NAIJA LOCAL BOARD . E good say you don talk wetin you wan know about since this place nah where to learn and educate other people about bitcoin too e Mae sense say you don show for here. As you don see links of many kind don pop out for you from our senior oga them make use of am and no still fail to ask them things you brain box no fit remember. But no make mistake go open this same topic for international board abeg becos this type of thread don full this forum "I am a newbie". Abeg try dy push am small small you go become senion oga for here too.
